item.title: New Release - 0.1.0
item.description: This is the initial release of the Cake.Grunt Addin for Cake. This is essentially a port of the Cake.Gulp. Full credit to Ken Lea for doing this work!
item.author: gep13
item.content:encoded:
Initial Release

This is the initial release of the Cake.Grunt Addin for Cake. This is essentially a port of the Cake.Gulp. Full credit to Ken Lea for doing this work!

Please do not hesitate to reach out in the Gitter Channel if you have any issues using this addin.
